DOC.brief_summary: A study to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of Study of MK0928 in Healthy Adult Volunteers in a Model of Insomnia for insomnia (a sleep disorder).
DOC.brief_title: Study of MK0928 in Healthy Adult Volunteers in a Model of Insomnia (0928-006)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Healthy adults who are between the ages of 18 and 64 Adults who are diagnosed with insomnia
